response.original_title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba – Swordsmith Village Arc
response.overview: Tanjiro Kamado and his demon-sister Nezuko travel to the secretive Swordsmith Village so Tanjiro’s damaged sword can be repaired. While there, they ally with the Mist Hashira Muichiro Tokito and Love Hashira Mitsuri Kanroji, and with Demon Slayer Genya Shinazugawa join the fight when two powerful Upper Rank demons infiltrate the village. Will they protect the village’s sacred craft and survive the onslaught of ancient evil?
response.tagline: Forged in steel, tested by demons.
response.title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba – Swordsmith Village Arc
